product.name: CoverGirl Outlast Stay Fabulous 3-in-1 Foundation
product.description:
CoverGirl Outlast Stay Fabulous 3-in-1 foundation is an all-in-one foundation with a long-lasting formula that fuses primer, 
concealer, and foundation in one easy step! The 3-in-1 formula provides a
 flawless look that lasts all day long.Features: All day, longwear formulaPrimer, concealer, and foundation in oneSmooth, flawless finishFoundation + Sunscreen SPF 20
